Pre-Game Insights: This is the first T20I bilateral series for Australia in Scotland.
Veteran all-rounder, Mitchell Marsh will be leading the Australian side with many senior players rested.
Richie Berrington will lead the Scottish side and Mathew Cross will keep the wickets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This series will be Australia's first T20I series after the ICC T20 World Cup 2024.
The Aussies will move to England after the series for a white-ball series including Three T20Is and five ODIs.
Others: The series will be played at Grange Cricket Club, Edinburgh.
The second match will be played on Friday and final T20I will be played the next day at the same venue.
